feat: Initial Phase 1 MVP - Peptide Health Platform

This commit includes the complete Phase 1 MVP implementation:

Website (Next.js 14):
- Landing page with hero, features, pricing, and CTA sections
- Authentication system with NextAuth (login/register)
- Dashboard with protocol overview and quick actions
- Protocol management UI (list, detail, templates)
- Injection tracking with site rotation
- Health tracking (weight, energy, sleep, mood)
- Product catalog and shop pages
- Responsive design with dark mode

UI Components:
- Button, Card, Input, Badge, Avatar, Progress
- Custom Tailwind theme with brand colors
- Neumorphic design elements

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Zustand for state management
